nodes.text: Oudon was a Human male Corellian who lived on the planet Corellia during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He and Hendrick both worked at a factory owned by Celestial Industries in the Labor Valley prior to the Battle of Corellia, at which time Oudon led a resistance cell against the Sith Empire's occupation. Havoc Squad linked up Oudon's cell with Hendrick's and Sherro's, and the group set up an ambush in the Celestial Industries factory that wiped out a large number of Imperials.
